author: andschwa
body: This one is odd. Intermittently, the values will be backwards        Should return the column info in the second element of the output array 76ms    String lengths are both 28. Strings differ at index 1.    Expected    FirstColumn , SecondColumn      But was     SecondColumn , FirstColumn                  ^    at line  24 in  home andrew monad linux src pester tests ConvertTo Csv.Tests.ps1    24          $result 1    Should Be  `FirstColumn` ,`SecondColumn`        Should return the data as a comma separated list in the third element of the output array 23ms    String lengths are both 15. Strings differ at index 1.    Expected    Hello , World      But was     World , Hello                  ^    at line  29 in  home andrew monad linux src pester tests ConvertTo Csv.Tests.ps1    29          $result 2    Should Be  `Hello` ,`World`     VSO create date - 12/22/2015 16:59:00     VSO closed date - 1/6/2016 13:00:00
title: Fix Convert-ToCsv tests
